article_metadata.description: The president of a democracy wields an awesome power when the people are united behind him! President Obama, a relatively inexperienced politician, tends to focus on the power of the office, not the power of the people united behind that office.The Affordable Care Act (Obamacare) was passed without a single Republican vote. The Senate wasn’t even allowed to vote on the Iran deal. These two items illustrate the difference between the power of the office of President and the power of a
